titleStmt.title: The alphabet of prayers very fruitefull to be exercised and vsed of euerye Christian man. Newly collected and set forth, in the yeare of our Lorde, 1564. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed in the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Cancellar, James,

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Denham, dwelling in Paternoster Rowe, at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Paternoster Rowe, at the signe of the Starre
